titleStmt.title: His Highness Prince Rupert's letter to the Earl of Arlington, His Majesties principal secretary of state. from on board the Royal Charles off the oster-bank, the XXIXth of May, 1673. Distant from East Capel Seven Leagues, at one of the clock afternoon, the wind S.S.W.
titleStmt.author: Rupert, Prince, Count Palatine, 1619-1682.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
